title: Stable Doodle AI can turn doodlers into artists
description: The latest from Stability AI offers a fast way to breathe life into your ideas and you don't need to be a great artist either.

title: Intel Macs support could disappear soon if Apple remains consistent
description: Apple could start ending support for its Intel MacBooks, according to past behavior with its previous devices.

title: This simple iOS 17 trick could straighten out all your photos
description: Apple enhanced its Camera app with a simple but super useful tool

title: AMD RX 7800 beats Nvidia RTX 4070 in leaked benchmark, but there's a problem
description: The AMD RX 7800 is hopefully just several weeks away from release, but a newly leaked benchmark is definitely cause for some concern.

title: This original iPhone just sold for about $200,000
description: A rare original iPhone model has just been auctioned off for close to $200,000.

title: Google Pixel Fold 2: what we want to see
description: The Google Pixel Fold 2 is likely to land in 2024 and will hopefully offer some big improvements.

title: Wix will soon let you use AI to create your entire website from scratch
description: Wix reveals new set of AI functionalities to streamline the website building process.

title: American SMBs are falling way behind when it comes to taking their business online
description: Many American SMBs don’t even have their own domain, blaming the economy, a lack of workers, and poor knowledge.

title: Your Twitter settings may no longer allow DMs - here's how to change it
description: Elon Musk has turned our DMs into a big Twitter Blue ad - but you can change it back.

title: Samsung’s new 98-inch 8K TV is the projector-beating home theater upgrade I’ve been waiting for
description: Samsung adds a second 98-inch TV to its 2023 lineup – and this one's an 8K Neo QLED.

title: Sadly, Netflix’s password clampdown is proving successful as subscribers are set to soar
description: Netflix has reportedly added nearly 2 million new subscribers since it began its password sharing crackdown in the US.

description: Security incident targeting a select handful of users has repercussions for all JumpCloud customers.

description: A new rumor has suggested a possible October launch for Apple’s next-gen processors, with Mac hardware to carry them.

title: New iPhone 15 leak all but confirms its biggest change
description: Apple is predicted to be rolling out the Dynamic Island to its entire iPhone 15 range.

title: Microsoft is binning Xbox Live Gold and replacing it with Game Pass Core
description: In a bid to provide players with more choice and value Microsoft is replacing Xbox Live Gold with Game Pass Core as its newest subscription service.

title: Microsoft still isn't sure how Chinese hackers got access to its systems
description: Microsoft continues investigation into how Chinese hackers managed to steal account consumer signing key.

title: Content from my favorite wellness app will soon be free for Spotify subscribers
description: Spotify is distributing some of Calm's meditation content via its Open Access platform.

title: Thousands of Docker container images could be leaking security secrets

title: Russia bans government officials from using iPhones in phone hacking fear

title: GSMA and European Space Agency team up to build the next generation of space networks

title: Your Microsoft Excel spreadsheets could soon be more off-putting than ever

title: After 16 long years, Team Fortress 2 has beaten its own record for most players

title: Sega Saturn Mini console hasn't been ruled out, but don't expect it anytime soon
